name: The Last Plant
description:
help the last plant survive through apocalypse

keep the last plant alive by catering to its needs and preventing toxicity.
protect the plant from weather when appropriate by sheltering and purifying the plant,  though you will also loose the weathers benefits.

*detailed instructions within in game

**Summary -** small resource management game based on juggling the needs of the plant while dealing with random weather events that shake up what plant stats are most important to tend to

Controls

move upwards- W key                                   move downwards- S key  

move left- A key                                             move right- D key 

interact- E key                                                   zoom- mouse scroll  

open and close options menu (in game)- escape key

                                                    

           

hope you enjoy my project, first attempt at a game jam so any feedback would be great ,not an artist but happy with the mechanics i managed to include programming wise
